ActCanada Pension Plan Investment Board Act
PrecisAppointment of SYLVIA D. CHROMINSKA of Toronto, Ontario, to be a director of the Board of Directors of the Canada Pension Plan Investment Board, to hold office during good behaviour for a term of three years, effective September 4, 2018, in the place of Robert L. Brooks, whose term has expired.
